mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERSHIP ( MEMBERSHIP_ID, MEMBER_ID, MEMBERSHIP_TYPE, PERIOD_DAYS, START_DATE, END_DATE, PRICE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBERSHIP_ID.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, 'ACTIVE', #{periodDays}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{price}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT m.MEMBERSHIP_ID, m.MEMBER_ID, mem.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBERSHIP_TYPE, m.PERIOD_DAYS, m.START_DATE, m.END_DATE, m.PRICE, m.MEMBERSHIP_STATUS, m.CREATED_AT, m.UPDATED_AT FROM MEMBERSHIP m JOIN MEMBER mem ON m.MEMBER_ID = mem.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY m.MEMBERSHIP_ID DESC

SELECT m.MEMBERSHIP_ID, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBERSHIP_TYPE, m.PERIOD_DAYS, m.START_DATE, m.END_DATE, m.PRICE, m.MEMBERSHIP_STATUS, m.CREATED_AT, m.UPDATED_AT, mem.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName FROM MEMBERSHIP m JOIN MEMBER mem ON m.MEMBER_ID = mem.MEMBER_ID WHERE MEMBERSHIP_ID = #{membershipId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERSHIP SET START_DATE = #{startDate, jdbcType=DATE}, END_DATE = #{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}, MEMBERSHIP_STATUS = #{membershipStatus}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBERSHIP_ID = #{membershipId}

mapper.select: SELECT m.MEMBERSHIP_ID, m.MEMBER_ID, mem.MEMBER_NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBERSHIP_TYPE, m.PERIOD_DAYS, m.START_DATE, m.END_DATE, m.PRICE, m.MEMBERSHIP_STATUS, m.CREATED_AT, m.UPDATED_AT, m.SUSPEND_START_DATE, m.SUSPEND_END_DATE, m.REMAINING_DAYS, m.EXTENDED_END_DATE FROM MEMBERSHIP m JOIN MEMBER mem ON m.MEMBER_ID = mem.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.MEMBERSHIP_STATUS IN (1,2)
